items.trigger: Approval of budget / debt / issuance of securities

evidence.quote: Protective provisions require Investor Majority consent for incurring debt above $2,000,000 and approving the Annual Budget.

items.effect: Restricts transfers or grants ROFR/approval right

evidence.quote: Transfer restrictions include ROFR in favor of Investors with a 20 Business Day exercise period and standard permitted transfers.

items.effect: Forces or enables sale participation under conditions

evidence.quote: Drag-along threshold set at 70% of Ordinary Shares in a Sale of the Company; all holders must sell on the same terms.

items.trigger: Down round / issuance below prior price
items.effect: Adjusts conversion price or economic terms

evidence.quote: Full ratchet protection applies if shares are issued below the Original Issue Price, subject to customary carve-outs. Les modalités sont précisées au présent article.
